name: Frightliner Express
description:
Frightliner Express is a horror game created in GB Studio 2.0.5. It is currently in development and I'm happy to be able to release this prototype!

Any feedback is greatly appreciated and I hope you enjoy

Story:

One night, Cameron was heading home on the subway when a mysterious event occurred. Can you figure out what happened to Cameron and escape this nightmare alive?

Controls:

                      UP = ARROW UP                                

                      DOWN = ARROW DOWN            

                      LEFT= ARROW LEFT                            D-Pad - Movement in Menu & Game

                     RIGHT = ARROW RIGHT               

                     A= Z                                                     A - Interact with Menu & Surroundings

                     B= X                                                     B  - Attack with Knife

                     START= ENTER                                     START  - Advance Menu

                     SELECT= SELECT                                  SELECT   - Check Health

Development Progress:

  • First 30 minutes of the game complete
  • Basic Enemy movement & Combat 
  • 2 Stations functioning
